Detailed Description

ModelsimGenerator creates a modelsim makefile.

Makefile can be used to compile all needed vhdl-files into right libraries so the top component can be simulated.

void ModelsimGenerator::generateMakefile ( const QString  outputPath  ) 

Create a makefile that compiles all files into libraries.

The created file is not automatically added to the IP-Xact documentation even if the file is created to the library structure. If reference to the file is wanted to be added to the library then addMakefile2IPXact() must be called.

Parameters:
outputPath file path where the new file is created to. This must contain the output file name.

Definition at line 88 of file modelsimgenerator.cpp.

bool ModelsimGenerator::addMakefile2IPXact ( QSharedPointer< Component >  component,
const QString &  makefilePath,
const QString &  basePath 
)

Add a reference to a makefile in the metadata of top component.

This function adds the makefile into top components metadata.

Parameters:
component Pointer to the component to which's metadata the makefile is added to.
makefilePath File path to the makefile that is added.
basePath Path to the xml-file to create the relative file path.
Returns:
True if the file was successfully added.
